lead_paragraph: Hendrick Motorsports said Casey Mears, who has been with the team since 2007, would be released at the end of this season. Heading into Sunday’s Nascar race at New Hampshire International Speedway, Mears has only three top-10 finishes and is 24th in the Sprint Cup standings.
